metadata.title: CVE-2016-4993 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: CRLF injection vulnerability in the Undertow web server in WildFly 10.0.0,as used in Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform (EAP) 7.x before7.0.2, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTTP headers and conductHTTP response splitting attacks via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: undertow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
